name: Roark's Attack on Titan Fan Game RE-UPLOAD
name_original: Roark's Attack on Titan Fan Game RE-UPLOAD
description:
This is a re-upload of Roarks AOT Fan Game. I take NO CREDIT for this game. Again this is NOT my game. This version is from September 2021 so it is about a year old. His download is no longer working for some reason. Here is a link to the original project, please go support it! https://roarkdev.itch.io/raot https://gamejolt.com/games/raot/613147

My discord is Desolation#6053
